1.0.0.name: wordpress/auto-nofollow-links
1.0.0.description:
Auto NoFollow Links adds nofollow attribute to all external links in your blog posts automatically. save you a tremendous amount of time.

Features

  • Add rel="nofollow" to all external links, SEO friendly.
  • Add target="_blank", Open external links in new window or tab

For more infomation:

  • http://www.apponsite.com/wpextends/plugins/auto-nofollow-links.html
  • http://www.apponsite.com/wpextends
